review: The product is OK, but its not that easy to use.  It will dirve you to pay per view programs instead of defaulting to free programing you get via amazon prime.  Also, it didn't work correctly until it was hooked up over night.  I think it was doing an update but didn't indicate that.  Its not a bad product but not as good as it should be.
